show.subtitle: Specific information about using evidenced based natural health choices, with knowledgeable authors, guests and hosts.
show.title: The Natural Nurse

title: Sacred Geometry and Energy Healing
content:
Host Ellen Kamhi, PhD, RN, www.naturalnurse.com, interviews Gregory Hoag. Gregory is a Â scientist, best selling author and artist, has researched Sacred Geometry and consciousness for 40 years.
Following a major spiritual awakening (Kundalini) in 1982, he started offering energetic tools through Metaforms Ltd.
He is recognized as one of the leading, worldwide experts on Sacred Geometric technologies for improving health, raising consciousness, reducing stress, manifesting intent and clearing emotional and electromagnetic interference.
Contact www.metaforms.net
